summary:
Inspired by the power we can build to change the world - by becoming activists, collectively.
Expert and trainer in impact and influence strategies, campaigning, narratives and storytelling, public mobilizations and community organizing.
Passionate about strategic thinking that allows organizations to change the world while changing themselves.
headline: Co-director Multitudes Foundation - Activist and organizer - Obama Leaders Europe 2020

experience.description: Multitudes supports people across Europe to reimagine who holds political power, how it’s exercised and how people connect to it.
experience.title: Co-directrice

experience.description:
I equip and support those who want to make the world fairer, more equitable, healthy and democratic. For this, I help them to draw on their experiences and values to develop their individual and collective leadership and build effective strategies to change the world.

My areas of expertise: leadership development, individual and collective empowerment, citizen participation, organizing, activism, campaign strategy (campaigning), citizen mobilizations, narrative strategies and strategic communications, storytelling, influence, lobbying and advocacy.

My interventions: conferences, training and workshops, strategic support and consulting

I worked with European Climate Foundation, Article 1, Oxfam France, One campaign, L'alliance citoyenne, Chemins d'avenir, Mutuelles Solimut, Levica, Havas, Orange, Démocratie Ouverte, OPEN network, Datapraxis, Ulule, Schoolab, . ..
experience.title: Consultant, trainer and organizer in activism and collective action

experience.companyName: EFAP - Ecole des nouveaux métiers de la communication
experience.title: Teacher "Influence and lobbying"

experience.description:
My team and I, we give people the power to create the change they want to see in the world.

> As part of the global executive team: Development of the strategic vision of member impact, brand strategy, development of technological solutions, governance and team management

> Strategic direction and implementation in France based on global orientations and adapted to the local context around the 3 main goals : impact, sustainability, influence

> Management of a team of 7 people: structuring and recruitment of a new team in 2018, collective and individual growth action plan, performance monitoring and development, well-being at work and culture.

> Development of the impact strategy: implementation of programs to improve the mobilization capacity of our members: community organizing training, individual and collective coaching, support strategies "at scale" for petitioners and their support.

> Development of the brand strategy: notoriety, affinity and content (brand platform, 360 communication - press and public relations, digital and social media strategies, events)

> External representation and spokesperson, brand protection: strategy and deployment to institutional, political, media, associative targets and in the tech ecosystem

> Advocacy and influence: deployment of a strategy centered on the recognition of Change.org petitions by political institutions and the development of an institutional output for petitions

> Legal and policy monitoring and orientations : working in collaboration with the global team: reporting and risk assessment, deployment of moderation and data protection policies.
experience.title: Executive Director

education.description:
The journey to transformative change in our societies begins with the stories we tell. Co-hosted by NEON and ASO Communications, this programme brings together a small cohort of communicators from around the world for an intensive two-month course. Taught and led by Anat Shenker-Osorio, participants explore cognitive research on perception and persuasion, language and semantics, and what’s working and how to fix what’s not in current campaign communication.

- Narrative frameworks and theories
- Reframing and language analysis skills
- Presentation and public speaking skills
- Continued coaching and support
education.schoolName: ASO communications / New Economy Organizers Network

education.degreeName: Training program to prepare women to political leadership

education.description: Public narrative is a leadership-development practice developed by Marshall Ganz—a former longtime United Farm Workers organizer and now Harvard professor. It's an exercise of leadership aimed towards motivating others to join you in action on behalf of a shared purpose.

publications.name: Changer le monde. Manuel d’activisme pour reprendre le pouvoir
publications.description:
Avez-vous déjà ressenti de la frustration ou de la colère en regardant les infos ?
Avez-vous déjà eu envie de vous engager pour que les choses changent, mais sans savoir comment vous y prendre ?

Parce que notre crise démocratique est plus criante que jamais, il est indispensable d'agir ensemble pour changer nos vies. Et pour cela, nous, citoyennes et citoyens, devons avoir toutes les cartes en main pour nous mobiliser efficacement.
Ce livre – à mi-chemin entre un témoignage inspirant et un guide pratique truffé d'exemples de mobilisations citoyennes réussies – montre que nous pouvons toutes et tous utiliser les méthodes de l'activisme pour faire bouger les lignes. Écrire un texte de pétition efficace, fédérer et animer une communauté de soutien, organiser une action coup de poing et pousser les responsables politiques à répondre... toutes ces actions sont à notre portée.
Nous avons plus de pouvoir que nous le pensons. Nous devons juste apprendre à l'utiliser pour changer le monde.

member.occupation: Co-director Multitudes Foundation - Activist and organizer - Obama Leaders Europe 2020

publications.name: Le coeur et le poing - le podcast à la recherche de l'âme d'activiste
publications.description: Cette enquête sous forme de podcast interrogera celles et ceux qui vivent près de nous, les activistes, mais qui ont décidé de ne pas suivre nos folies militantes. Quel regard portent nos proches sur notre engagement et que peut-on en apprendre de nous-même ? Existe-t-il une âme d'activiste ?

member.occupation: Co-director Multitudes Foundation - Activist and organizer - Obama Leaders Europe 2020

volunteer.description: Quartier General builds collective support for grassroots activists running for election. We organize peer support, coaching and encourage resource-sharing between independent candidates by fostering solidarity, loyalty and shared purpose. Candidates at QG run for election while advocating for a renewal of democracy through ethical and community-rooted political power.

Empow’her supports  women entrepreneurs so they can change the world. Empow'Her is an international network of organizations dedicated to the social and economic empowerment of women. We mobilize around a common vision: a more inclusive entrepreneurial space as a source of empowerment for women and a catalyst for transformation.

Rencontre des Justices is a grassroots movement bringing together 300 activists and social entrepreneurs taking action for equality, social and climate justice. We aim to collectively advance 30 “goals for justice” by 2030.
